title: Make gradient name text solid color

requirements.summary: Replace gradient styling on the name text in HeroSection with a single solid color
acceptanceCriteria: The name text displays in a single solid color instead of a gradient
The color maintains sufficient contrast for readability
Only the selected span element is modified

file_operations.description: Remove the gradient text styling classes from the second span element containing the name and replace with a solid color class. Update the className to use a warm, readable color with good contrast against the background (e.g., text-[oklch(0.65_0.2_40)] or similar warm tone from the existing color system).
